content: **emotional support pickle** because sometimes life gets spicy and you need a little briny buddy to get you through this quick and scrappy crochet project works up fast and is perfect for using up leftover yarn make one or a whole jar and add a face to match your mood happy grumpy chaotic or just mildly concerned finished size ~6 5 tall by 2 5 wide gauge lol who needs gauge it s a pickle materials small amount of yarn fiberfill stuffing g or h hook stitch marker and your creative spirit
